title: The Age of Strife
content: The fragmentation of the cosmos; the Earth is caught within the tumult.

title: The Age of Ash
content: The conflict between the Gods leads to a seismic event that engulfs the world in a great ash cloud for 53 years.

title: The Midnight War
content: States and kingdoms wage war over the scarce resources in a world benighted by the impenetrable ash.
sub_title: The Great War Fought in Darkness

title: The False Peace
content: A time of fragile peace brought about by the lifting of the ash and the eventual end of the War; an age when dragons return.
sub_title: The Ash Lifts and the War Ends

title: The Age of False Gods
content: The growing influence of draconic cults; the proliferation of multiple sects.

title: The Resurgent Strife
content: Renewed war between the Gods; the Great Separation of the Continents; renewed upheaval and calamity.
sub_title: The End of the False Peace

title: The Age of Ruin
content: Renewed fervour for dragon worship; expanding influence of cults.

title: The Long Decay
content: The abandonment of the old Gods; a rejection of their conflict.
sub_title: The Last Temple Falls to Ruin
